reviews: I bought these for a Christmas gift for myself to make oil rollers with. I finally had time this evening to make a few. I filled the oil blends in the bottles and went to put the bottle toppers on and they don’t fit. The bottle hole is to big or the toppers are to small and will not stay on. Very un-happy right now!!
My son loves this phone. It is great quality. It has everything you’d want a child to have for a phone. And you can control everything for parent control. I recommend this for your child.
The made for a great Christmas gift. Great quality, warm and the sizing is accurate. Makes for a good work sweater for those who work outside.
Made for a nice Christmas gift. Good quality hat.
This made a great Christmas gift. The sweater is good quality, warm and the sizing is accurate.
The game is what we expected and it came quickly.

review_title: The sound is very pour, very distorted, not worth what you pay
reviews:
Santa brought my son the spy gear walkie talkies for Christmas and the sound is so distorted that you can’t make out what the other person is saying. This was very disappointing! I would not recommend the walkie talkies. For the price you are paying, you should be able to hear each other.
Thank you for your time.

I was happy with this product. It was easy to setup, very comfortable and the price is good.

The product has a few issues with the accuracy of steps, step and calorie counts but all in all it’s a good watch to tell time before it broke...

After two months the button on the USB charger side of the strap came out and I cannot put it back together therefore the strap does not lock on the base of the watch. The button on the strap is obviously weak/flimsy.

Disappointed!! - this watch was only two months old.

** I’m very impressed with the experience I’ve had after expressing my disappointment with this product. I heard back from them within 24 hours and within 48 to 72 hours I received a shipping confirmation of my product replacement. I was shocked that they took responsibility and sent me a new watch, very impressed with their speedy responds time and compassion for excellence customer service! Thank you for the product replacement. You know how to right the wrong - keep up the outstanding customer service!
